section.title: Overview
section.p: This section describes the commands for HA monitoring.
The following commands are used to monitor HA:

li.p: ha role to check a node’s HA role whether it is Active or Standby.
ha check to check the status of all the services monitored by HA whether they are healthy or not.

ha switch to trigger a graceful activity switch between two HA nodes from Active to Standby. To initiate an activity switch, you must run the “ha switch” command from an “ssh” session to the fixed IP address of the Active VM; otherwise, when the VIP moves to the other VM the session will be lost and the switch will not be successful.

note.p: In ha check output, all nodes should show Active or Standby (based on their respective ha role status) and OK.
